name: Hedgehog Golf 1999: golf of the year edition
name_original: Hedgehog Golf 1999: golf of the year edition
description:
Welcome to Hedgehog Golf, more specifically -

"Hedgehog Golf 1999: golf of the year edition" (funny name)

If you want a simple golf game with a cute hedgehog rolling around, this game is for you!

This game was made for a hedgehog-themed jam. Instructions on how to play are inside the game. All credits to music and sound effects as well.

The Team:

Coding and Ideas - ThatMegalosaurus

Art and Ideas - SandiiSnooters
